settings.text:
All apparel is unisex with a relaxed fit. Measurements are in inches.

Unsure of sizing? Reach out to us at help@pupsentials.com

All apparel is unisex with a relaxed fit. Measurements are in inches.

The denim jacket is slightly oversized while the denim pearl jacket is true to size.

Unsure of sizing? Reach out to us at help@pupsentials.com

When washing your Pupsentials product, turn your item inside out, machine wash cold, and lay flat to dry. Do not iron directly on embroidery. Avoid bleach or high heat to preserve color and stitching.

Because each item is custom-made, orders ship in 3–4 weeks from proof approval. During holiday seasons or with multiple pets, timelines may extend to 5–6 weeks.

You can request a full refund within 24 hours of ordering by emailing us at support@pupsentials.com.

If your artwork hasn’t been started yet, we’ll refund you in full.

If the artwork has already been created, you’ll receive a refund minus a $35 hand-drawn artwork fee to honor our artist’s time and care.

Because every item is made just for you, we do not accept returns or exchanges after 24 hours unless something arrives damaged or incorrect.

Show us how you wear your pup’s love
@pupsentials

settings.title: A PERSONAL TRIBUTE
settings.description: All our pieces are 1 of 1 — drawn and stitched by real artists — to showcase the unique bond you have with your pup.

settings.title: REmember Every Detail
settings.description: With over 25,000 stitches per piece, we highlight every expression, marking, and nuance of your pet’s face to keep their memory alive.

settings.title: CARRY THEM WITH YOU
settings.description: Put your pet right over your heart. Made with care and compassion, every detail is thoughtfully stitched to honor the love you shared.

settings.text: A Love Like Theirs Deserves to be Remembered

settings.testimonial_1_text: This was a gift for my mom in memory of her very special boy! Pupsentials did a great job capturing Merle's happy face!
settings.testimonial_2_text: I recently lost my sweet Maxie girl after nearly 16 years. Her and her sister Lyla have always been inseparable. This beautiful cozy sweatshirt is a way for the 3 of us to be together again.
settings.testimonial_3_text: A sweatshirt for my daughter featuring her past and current Corgis—complete with a halo over Chloe. She cried when she opened it. Perfect gift!
settings.testimonial_4_text: I recently lost my sweet Maxie girl after nearly 16 years. Her and her sister Lyla have always been inseparable. This beautiful cozy sweatshirt is a way for the 3 of us to be together again.
settings.testimonial_5_text: I bought my sister a sweatshirt after the passing of her pup and she cried at how beautiful and precise the portrait was. She wears it all the time now and loves the weight of the sweatshirt for layering too. Thank you so much Pupsentials for helping us connect and grieve.
